item.title: 中国是占主导地位的太阳能设备供应商，去年其生产能力翻了一番，使美国的太阳能设备价格创下新低。这对希望与之竞争的美国开发商构成了威胁
item.description:
China is the dominant solar equipment supplier and it doubled its production capacity last year, driving prices to record lows in the US. This is a threat to American developers who want to compete with it https://t.co/JB0T1bg2CS pic.twitter.com/3JmZvzFkyS

— Financial Times (@FT) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国众议院以压倒性多数票通过了一项法案，如果 TikTok 的中国所有者不剥离所有权，将禁止应用程序商店分发 TikTok。
item.description:
The US House of Representatives has voted overwhelmingly to approve a bill that would ban app stores from distributing TikTok if its Chinese owner does not divest ownership https://t.co/E2GklRHVrt pic.twitter.com/RCKffYHG8j

— Financial Times (@FT) March 13, 2024

item.title: 一位了解袭击情况的乌克兰官员告诉我，乌克兰安全局在 "一系列针对敌方炼油厂的特别行动中......使用了无人机......以剥夺敌人的资源，减少石油资金和燃料的流动"。
item.description:
A Ukrainian official with knowledge of the attacks tells me the SBU used attack drones in “a series of special operations against enemy oil refineries … to deprive the enemy of resources and reduce the flow of oil money and fuel”. w/ @NastyaStognei @FT https://t.co/xdALB9CBpU

— Christopher Miller (@ChristopherJM) March 13, 2024

item.title: 由于廉价进口产品激增，美国太阳能制造商面临 "严峻形势"。"市场太糟糕了，"Heliene 公司负责人 Martin Pochtaruk 说，该公司推迟了增加一条 500 兆瓦生产线的计划。"我们不想咬我们无法咀嚼的东西。
item.description:
US solar manufacturers in "dire situation" as cheap imports soar

“The market is crap,” said Martin Pochtaruk, head of Heliene, a solar-panel maker that delayed plans to add a 500MW factory line. “We don’t want to bite something we cannot chew.” w/@Dimihttps://t.co/0Knpjqe4ei pic.twitter.com/TX4Zawv4ER

— Amanda Chu (@amandalanchu) March 13, 2024

item.title: "两年没有休息，没有轮换--当然，士气低落，动力不足。我们需要轮换或正常休假来好好休息"。@IKoshiw为@FT提供的关于乌克兰动员问题的精彩报道。
item.description:
“Two years without a break, without rotation — of course, morale is low and it’s killing motivation. We need either rotation or normal vacations to rest properly.” Good reporting from @IKoshiw for @FT on Ukraine's mobilization issue. https://t.co/ui6t7eG5rC

— Christopher Miller (@ChristopherJM) March 13, 2024
